sentences.sContent: A torch symbolizes the brightness (of the future).
sentences.sContent_eng: A torch symbolizes the brightness (of the future).

sentences.sContent: She took the little girl in her arms, and they both flew upwards in brightness and joy far above the earth, where there was neither cold nor hunger nor pain, for they were with God.
sentences.sContent_eng: She took the little girl in her arms, and they both flew upwards in brightness and joy far above the earth, where there was neither cold nor hunger nor pain, for they were with God.
sentences.sCn: 她把小姑娘抱起来，搂在怀里。 她们俩在光明和快乐飞走了，越飞越高，飞到既没有寒冷，又没有饥饿和痛苦的地方，因为她们来到了极乐世界。

sentences.sContent: It also will measure the brightness of each laser reflection.
sentences.sContent_eng: It also will measure the brightness of each laser reflection.
sentences.sCn: 它还将测量每一道激光反射的光亮度。
